li.p: Nominal STS input voltage ratings are 600VAC, 480VAC, 400VAC, 240VAC, 208VAC, LL RMS 3- phase, (3) wires + ground.
Source Voltage Distortion: Up to 15% THD plus notches, flat topping, and/or ringing transients
The STS output voltage is the same as the input voltage.

body.p:
Current:
The STS continuous current rating is 2000A input and output.
If the STS output is to a PDU, the STS continuous current rating must match or exceed the PDU input rating.
Short circuit rating: 65 KAIC up to 600 volts
Load Power Factor Range: 0.5 to 1.0, leading or lagging
Overload Capacity with Molded Case Circuit Breaker (MCCB) trip settings set to highest limits:
Ground: STS2000A system includes a computer grade single-point ground compliant with FIPS Pub 94 and NEC requirements.
